document.docAuthor: Simaiakis, Stylianos Michail, Akkari, Nesrine & Zapparoli, Marzio
document.masterDocTitle: The centipedes of Peloponnisos and first records of genus Eurygeophilus in the East Mediterranean (Myriapoda: Chilopoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The centipedes of Peloponnisos and first records of genus Eurygeophilus in the East Mediterranean (Myriapoda: Chilopoda)

subSubSection.paragraph:
( 1 )
Lithobius lucifugus L Koch
:
Matic & Stavropoulos, 1988
: 42 .

( 2 )
Lithobius ( Lithobius ) lucifugus L. Koch
:
Zapparoli, 1994
: 43 .

( 3 )
Lithobius ( Lithobius ) lucifugus
L. Koch, 1862
:
Zapparoli, 2002
: 31 ,
Fig. 9
.

General distribution. Europe: Austria , Bosnia Herzegovina , Croatia , Czech Republic , France , Germany , Greece , Hungary , Italy , Montenegro , Poland , Romania , Russia , Slovakia , Slovenia , Sweden , Switzerland , Ukraine . West Asia: Caucasus, Turkey (
Zapparoli 2002
; Minelli et al. 2006 ).

New records from Mt. Parnonas (
Fig. 5
). 4 exx., Arkadia, Kastanitsa pathway SE to Prastos (loc. 3 ), 1020 m ,

Ecological notes. 585–2400 m ; a montane species, recorded under
Abies cephalonica
,
Fagus sylvatica
and
Pinus nigra
woods, and in open montane environments (
Matic & Stavropoulos 1988
; Zapparoli 1994 , 1996 ).
